articles.description: A study that tracked 173 St. Joseph's Health COVID patients found that half still had COVID symptoms after a year and 23% had them after 2 years.
articles.content: Patients who never needed hospitalization for COVID-19 early in the pandemic were still experiencing at least one persistent symptom a year later, showing that even mild cases can result in long-term… [+3753 chars]
